places_with_reviews.name: Shri Rani Bhatiyani Mandir Sansthan, Jasol

reviews.text: Rani Bhatiyani temple is a famous temple in Jasol. She is considered as Rajput princess who attained diety state. The temple is beautifully made and campus is well maintained. Mata bhatiyani is the clan diety of Manganiar musicians which is the famous community of bards. Many Manganiar singer- musician couples are found sitting at various places in temple and singing melodies in praise of goddess.

Obviously very positive vibe!
Also in way there was very talented Singers and musician! In way many shops so ya employment is generating in good amount! I noticed there are things are constructed maybe hotel rooms are to stay there for days! It's good!!!

A very beautiful Temple in Balotra. The infrastructure is very well maintained .The design of the temple is very beautiful .You will surely love the temple. You will also feel the power of the god here . Please visit if Possible you will be relaxed . I have a few photos I hope you like them  .

We received the blessings of Majisa Mata Rani very well along with the family. The temple trust committee management is very good, but I would like to suggest a complaint to the guest house trust committee, that the behavior of your staff on duty in the guest house is not good at all, especially with women and children. Who come to the temple for darshan. And if you have some rules and regulations, then you should write them on rule plates at various places. Do not insult anyone directly.

A divine destination I like mostly..
Sansthan has taken strict decision about not to allow any Prasad, Or any other item to the temple

They have made seperate place for such activities. This maintain clean and quiet area

places_with_reviews.name: Siwana phata

reviews.text:
Circle has four roads.....
We have to very much careful while turning ....
Here is circle to root to move different locations
This is good place.

This point (Tirah) of Siwana is beautiful to see, and from here one path goes to Balotra city and the other path goes to Sindhari, Sanchore and the third fort goes to Siwana. The border road also leads to Brahmaji's temple.
This Circle connect Jalore - Sindhri - Jodhpur - Balotra - Barmer
